page.title: 18HOME LIFE IN ERPINGHAM 1985
page.content: {MY HOUSE Our house is over 200 yrs. old. It is detached and has two extensions.Our extensions are our bathroom and a little porch.We have 7 rooms and a landing and most of the rooms are fair sized. In our big lounge is a wooburner,3 tablesof different sizes that fit on top of each other,a wooden elephant that we put on top of the tables,a 3 piece suite,tele and video plus lots more. Our front door is varnished and leads into our lounge.Our back door is a bit of a wreck and leads into a kind of porch where wekeep our coats and wellies.There is an open doorway that leads from the porch to th kitchen.The kitchen has a boiler,a microwave,a cooker,a mat for our two dogs and some cupboards and shelves.
